That... Actually seems fairly open to interpretation. 
[spoiler]I haven't seen any of season 4, do they build up their relationship more than the previous season? Because that's really my only problem with this idea. They never really spent that much time together in 1-3[/spoiler][/bq]
Eh; I think it's canon cause avatar does actually ship people and who are they going to ship Korra with? Mako?



Side note: I'm actually kind of saddened by how many homophobic comments I'm finding on Korrasami being canon.  I literally would have not found out about it if it weren't for all the people going "gay people are going to hell". . . -1 faith in humanity.
